Writer: Nikita Mikhalkov, Aleksandr Novototskiy-Vlasov, Vladimir Moiseenko
Actors: Sergey Makovetskiy, Nikita Mikhalkov, Sergey Garmash, Valentin Gaft
Plot: Twelve jurors must decide the fate of a Chechen adolescent charged with murdering his stepfather.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 9 wins & 7 nominations.
